category.category: Equipment for the and clothing industry
category.category_en: Equipment for the and clothing industry

title: Single needle quilting machine US-HX-22*25
title_uz: Bir ignali ko'rpa qavish uskunasi US-HX-22*25
short_description: As time progresses, techniques and technologies also grow. The equipment used in the textile industry is also increasing. One of them is the US-HX-22*25 quilting machine. The size of the equipment is 3*3*1.4 meters and the total weight is 720 kg. During sewing, the length between stitches can be adjusted from 2 mm to 10 mm. The maximum size of the stitch is 2.2*2.5 m.
short_description_uz: Zamon rivojlangani sayin texnika va texnologiyalar ham o'sib bormoqda. To'qimachilik sanoatida ishlatiladigan uskunalar ham ko'payib bormoqda. Ulardan biri US-HX-22*25 modelidagi ko'rpa qavish uskunasidir. Uskunaning o'lchami 3*3*1.4 metr va umumiy vazni 720 kg ni tashkil etadi. Tikish jarayonida choklar orasidagi uzunlik 2 mm dan 10 mm gacha sozlash mumkin. Tikishning maksimal o'lchami 2.2*2.5 m ni tashkil qiladi.
short_description_ru: С течением времени методы и технологии также растут. Увеличивается и количество оборудования, используемого в текстильной промышленности. Одна из них – стегальная машина US-HX-22*25. Размер оборудования 3*3*1,4 метра, общий вес 720 кг. Во время шитья длину между стежками можно регулировать от 2 мм до 10 мм. Максимальный размер шва 2,2*2,5 м.
short_description_en: As time progresses, techniques and technologies also grow. The equipment used in the textile industry is also increasing. One of them is the US-HX-22*25 quilting machine. The size of the equipment is 3*3*1.4 meters and the total weight is 720 kg. During sewing, the length between stitches can be adjusted from 2 mm to 10 mm. The maximum size of the stitch is 2.2*2.5 m.
long_description:
As time progresses, techniques and technologies also grow. The equipment used in the textile industry is also increasing. One of them is the US-HX-22*25 quilting machine. The size of the equipment is 3*3*1.4 meters and the total weight is 720 kg. During sewing, the length between stitches can be adjusted from 2 mm to 10 mm. The maximum size of the stitch is 2.2*2.5 m.

 

Basic parameters
Model US-HX-22*25
Max. quilting size............................................................................................... 2.2*2.5 m.........................................................................................
Max. needle drop size 2.0*2.3 m
Power 1.5 kW
Voltage 220V
Quilting thickness 1200 g/m2
Sewing speed 300-2500 rpm
Stitch length 2-10 mm (adjaustable)
Needle DP5 18-22
Size 3*3*1.4 m
Weight 720 kg
long_description_uz:
Zamon rivojlangani sayin texnika va texnologiyalar ham o'sib bormoqda. To'qimachilik sanoatida ishlatiladigan uskunalar ham ko'payib bormoqda. Ulardan biri US-HX-22*25 modelidagi ko'rpa qavish uskunasidir. Uskunaning o'lchami 3*3*1.4 metr va umumiy vazni 720 kg ni tashkil etadi. Tikish jarayonida choklar orasidagi uzunlik 2 mm dan 10 mm gacha sozlash mumkin. Tikishning maksimal o'lchami 2.2*2.5 m ni tashkil qiladi.

 

Umumiy parametrlar
Model US-HX-22*25
Maks. qovish o'lchami............................................................................................... 2.2*2.5 m.........................................................................................
Maks. igna yetuvchi o'lchami 2.0*2.3 m
Quvvati 1.5 kW
Kuchlanishi 220V
Qovish qalinligi 1200 g/m2
Tikish tezligi 300-2500 oborot/min
Chok uzunligi 2-10 mm (sozlanadigan)
Igna DP5 18-22
Uskuna o'lchami 3*3*1.4 m
Vazni 720 kg
long_description_ru:
С течением времени методы и технологии также растут. Увеличивается и количество оборудования, используемого в текстильной промышленности. Одна из них – стегальная машина US-HX-22*25. Размер оборудования 3*3*1,4 метра, общий вес 720 кг. Во время шитья длину между стежками можно регулировать от 2 мм до 10 мм. Максимальный размер шва 2,2*2,5 м.

 

Общие параметры
Модель US-HX-22*25
Макс. размер стеганого шитья............................................................................................... 2.2*2.5 м.........................................................................................
Макс. размер иглы 2.0*2.3 м
Мощность 1.5 кВт
Напряжение 220B
Толщина стежки 1200 г/м2
Скорость шитья 300-2500 об/мин
Длина стежка 2-10 мм (регулируемый)
Иголка DP5 18-22
Размер оборудования 3*3*1.4 м
Масса 720 кг
long_description_en:
As time progresses, techniques and technologies also grow. The equipment used in the textile industry is also increasing. One of them is the US-HX-22*25 quilting machine. The size of the equipment is 3*3*1.4 meters and the total weight is 720 kg. During sewing, the length between stitches can be adjusted from 2 mm to 10 mm. The maximum size of the stitch is 2.2*2.5 m.

 

Basic parameters
Model US-HX-22*25
Max. quilting size............................................................................................... 2.2*2.5 m.........................................................................................
Max. needle drop size 2.0*2.3 m
Power 1.5 kW
Voltage 220V
Quilting thickness 1200 g/m2
Sewing speed 300-2500 rpm
Stitch length 2-10 mm (adjaustable)
Needle DP5 18-22
Size 3*3*1.4 m
Weight 720 kg
